column5: Anyone going to be watching the fights tonight?  Predictions?  Jones vs. teixeria  Jones by decision  Phil Davis vs. Anthony Johnson  Davis by submission  Luke Rockhold vs. Tim Boetsch  Tim beotsch by ko  Jim miller vs Yancy medeiros  Yancy is hungry and has great hands... Yancy by ko   Max hallway vs  Andre fili  Andre fili by decision  G
Praying Glover puts JBJ to sleep or ktfo. Jones lost to Gustafsson and shouldn't even be headlining this one. Also pick Davis
I am not so sure after reading an article about his training after his last fight,  it made him realize slit of weaknesses I think he has learned a valuable lesson

this is a hard one but i think jones wins by GnP,although i want teixeria to win. davis by unanimous decision Boetsch by tko miller by tko halliway by spilt decision  and ill toss in jasmyn duke by sub  (prelim)

I'm pulling for Glover. I agree with Woodenboater and Misfish, Jones lost to Gus but I also don't think Glover will win tonight. I'm thinking Davis and Boetsch are going to deliver KO's. Should be a decent night of fights.
I'm still stunned that Browne was destroyed by Werdum lol

I'm still stunned that Browne was destroyed by Werdum lol Browne suffered a broken hand and nose in the first round,also said to have had a broken rib as well but that could have ended up as a bruised rib.in any case he fought hurt and was gassed.
All choked up! Impressive win for Miller. Wins by guillotine choke.
I was impressed by Johnson, and jones was vicious with those elbows!
Fight wasn't even close. Why was there no Jones - Gustavsson rematch right away? Especially after a war like that?
Fight wasn't even close. Why was there no Jones - Gustavsson rematch right away? Especially after a war like that? they do it for a build up. just like hendricks vs lawler
im suprised davis got dominated that bad and couldnt get a take down.
Loved Benavidez's guillotine and Elliot pounding the matt with his feet since his arms were locked up and couldn't tap.
Loved Benavidez's guillotine and Elliot pounding the matt with his feet since his arms were locked up and couldn't tap. that looked scary,you could see the panic in his eyes
